trans-unit.source: If you are using a self-hosted Plausible instance, add your Plausible domain here (https://your-custom-domain/)
Enter your Plausible site ID (domain without 'www') here
You must set a token here - generate on in your Plausible instance -> Settings -> API keys
Automatically adds the Plausible tracking script to the frontend
Most likely the same as "Plausible API base url". If you are using a self-hosted Plausible instance, use your Plausible domain here (https://your-custom-domain/)
Choose which type of script to include (read more: https://plausible.io/docs/script-extensions)
Global server side 404 error tracking for the entire site for this language. The error is tracked as a custom goal with the name 404.
